Class AbstractTransactionSampler

java.lang.Object
ca.yorku.cmg.cnsim.engine.AbstractTransactionSampler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISowable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileBasedTransactionSampler, StandardTransactionSampler
public abstract class AbstractTransactionSampler extends Object implements ISowable
Author:
Sotirios Liaskos for the Enterprise Systems Group @ York University

      public void setTxFeeValueMean(float txValueMean)
      Sets the mean transaction fee value.
      Parameters:
      txValueMean - The mean transaction fee value to be set (local tokens).
      Throws:
      ArithmeticException - if the provided value is less than 0.
